programme.title: #Investigation - EP 5
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 29
programme.desc: Nestling between Pyrenees-Atlantiques, Haute-Garonne and Spain, the department of the Hautes-Pyrenees offers nature at its most breathtaking. Mountains, forests, valleys, plains and a warm welcome from its locals combine in an invitation to recharge the batteries and escape the everyday, ensuring that a simple visit becomes a true break...

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 4
programme.desc: Having a water bottle, refusing to fly, eating less meat... What good do individual actions really do? How to have the greatest possible impact? Thomas Wansart, carbon footprint specialist, replies.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 5
programme.desc: The Earth's population has reached 8 billion. For some, the conclusion is obvious: the climate emergency is above all a problem of demography. But is it? Is the number of humans living on the planet really a problem? Does a child create that much pollution? Demographer Bruno Masquelier replies.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.desc: A foray into the unique world of the logging camps, where men and women from very different backgrounds live and work together. Through the eyes of women who have chosen to work in the timber industry, we discover a microcosm of society as each forestry season follows the last.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 15
programme.desc: Fans of a big thrill really love it: Europa Park, the famous leisure park in Germany. Some of its attractions hold European records. How are the rides designed? How are they maintained?

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 43
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 19
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 18
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 49
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 29
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 30
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 20
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 20
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 3
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 14
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 6
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 10
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 38
programme.desc: Possessing a piece of a celestial body is a dream for many and can be traded at an extremely high price. The meteorite business is booming, but the difficulty is finding one. Hunters have specialised in this geological and philosophical quest, which demands a certain patience. But beware of mirages!

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 1
programme.desc: How can we protect the forests of tomorrow if we don't understand the forests of yesteryear? Today, researchers attempt to travel back in time for a better vision of how the forests are reacting to the climate change that's already happening.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 11
programme.desc: One spring day in 1978, Sorofin arrived in France to join her husband in Montreuil, known as ''the little Bamako of Seine-Saint-Denis''. A working mother totally dedicated to bringing up her seven children, she has also become one of the pillars of the Association des Femmes Maliennes de Montreuil.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 11
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Les Voyageurs Solidaires - EP 1
programme.desc: Actor Bruno Solo heads to Elafonisos, a small Greek island just south of the Peloponnese. Covering some twenty square kilometres, Elafonisos is home to around seven hundred permanent residents, but is absolutely packed in summer! We meet those working to preserve and protect the island's natural beauty.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 24
programme.desc: Philippe Hurel, manufacturing high quality furniture since 1911. ''L'habit ne fait pas le moine'' (the clothes don't make the man): a very French expression from... Monaco. In Milly-la-Foret we discover the work of French artist Jean Cocteau. A timeless essential for the winter wardrobe: how to wear a cable sweater.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 23
programme.desc: At the edge of the Fontainebleau Forest, we visit a museum dedicated to the Barbizon painters. Diane Benoit du Rey paints light on canvas and light fittings. Between textile craftwork, painting and sport, the brand 3. Paradis, cultural fusion. Decorative gilder, there's gold at the tip of elisabeth Bonjean's paintbrush.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Internationales - EP 9
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Taratata 100% Live
programme.desc: For almost 90 minutes, watch the greatest names on the French and international music scene appear one after the other. Unexpected duets and trios, first-time covers, new talents... ''Taratata 100% live'' has all the ingredients that have made it a success, with even more live performances.

programme.title: Meurtres A Pont-L'eveque
programme.desc: Judge Daniel is found hanging in the former Pont-L'eveque prison. Julien and Franck Roussel, two brothers with a long-standing grudge, are forced to work together on an investigation that takes them back to the origins of their dissension when they both loved the same woman, Marion Letellier, the victim's clerk.

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: The classical painters represented at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art include Boulogne, La Tour, Lorrain, Chardin, Gros, Robert and Corot.

programme.title: Les Algues Vertes
programme.desc: Given the omerta on the subject of the algal blooms around Brittany's coasts, the journalist Ines Leraud decides to investigate. By meeting scientists, farmers and politicians, she's finally able to expose the pitiless system imposed by the agri-food industry and its interests, which couldn't care less about people and environment.

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Equipe De France De Rugby - Tournee D'automne 2024
programme.desc: A match with the French rugby team. Autumn 2024 tour. 1st half.

programme.title: Equipe De France De Rugby - Tournee D'automne 2024
programme.desc: A match with the French rugby team. Autumn 2024 tour. 2d half.

programme.title: La Cuisine Des Mousquetaires - EP 15
programme.desc: On today's menu: baba with raspberry and flower-infused gin.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 31
programme.desc: The ViaRhona, an 815 km cycle route that sets off from the shores of Lake Geneva, following the Rhone all the way to the Mediterranean. From the Ain to the Bouches-du-Rhone, we meet collectors, sports enthusiasts and nature-lovers, those who cycle for pleasure and, sometimes, those who cycle for work.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 3
programme.desc: Very much aware of their environmental footprint, Annie Brocoli and Joel Legendre take a close interest in sustainable tourism. They stop off in Vieux-Habitants, Guadeloupe, a destination renowned for its unique biodiversity and green tourism.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Nenette
programme.desc: Born in a Borneo forest in 1969, the orang-utan Nenette celebrates her 40th birthday. Living in the menagerie of the Jardin des Plantes, Paris, since 1972, she's been there longer than all the staff! Veritable star, the hundreds of visitors she attracts daily always have something to say about her.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: Jarred Gillett made history earlier this year when he became the first Premier League referee ever to be fitted with a special head-mounted camera during Crystal Palace's home victory over Manchester United. PL Stories is granted exclusive access to Gillet and his officiating team on matchday, offering fans a unique insight into refereeing at the highest level.

programme.title: MATCH OFFICIALS MIC'D UP - TUES 12 NOV
programme.desc: Match Officials Mic'd Up returns for a third episode of the 2024/25 season, with PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb joining Michael Owen to discuss key decisions from recent Premier League Matchweeks, using previously un-released audio between the on-field officials and VAR teams.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 3
programme.desc: PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb and current Premier League official Craig Pawson provide a unique insight into the skills required to referee at the top level.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypiä's journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: Growing up playing football on the streets of Paris, Alphonse Areola ended up living his dream of playing for PSG. In this week's Big Interview, Areola discusses competing with Gianluigi Buffon for the number 1 shirt in the French capital, the importance of his Filipino heritage and how he hopes West Ham can turn their fortunes around this season.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51
programme.desc: Season 2023 - 2024 has arguably been the greatest since the birth of the Premier League in 1992. Three elite teams racing to the finish line. Each of them believing this season will end in glory. The script of the story is captivating. Manchester City going for an historic fourth consecutive Premier League title. Arsenal looking for their first title in twenty years following their late season collapse in 2023.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 10 NOV
programme.desc: Highlights of all the fixtures from Matchweek 11 of the Premier League. Featuring the Brentford and Bournemouth weekend opener. Alongside Brighton's home game against the ever-dangerous Manchester City.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 13
programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.desc: He was a star of Australia's U23 and U17 teams and made his West Ham debut at just 18 years of age, but in 2011 Dylan Tombides life was turned upside down when he received a diagnosis of testicular cancer following a routine drug test during the Under-17 FIFA World Cup. Despite a courageous three-year battle, he tragically succumbed to the illness at the age of 20 in 2014.

programme.title: FS MMA Ricardo Prasel vs. Daniel Omielanczuk
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight KSW 70 with a heavyweight main event featuring former Chelsea goalkeeper Ricardo Prasel of Brazil taking on UFC veteran Daniel Omielanczuk. In the co-feature, more heavyweights square off as Marek Samociuk takes on Izuagbe Ugonoh, as well as a bout between female strawweights Anita Bekus and Roberta Zocco. It's a stacked card from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Ulrik Bokeme vs Hicham El Gaoui
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features main event Hicham El Gaoui of Morrocco as he looks to ruin the Congo's Ulrik Bokeme's perfect record.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: FS MMA Ricardo Prasel vs. Daniel Omielanczuk

Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: FS MMA Ricardo Prasel vs. Daniel Omielanczuk
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight KSW 70 with a heavyweight main event featuring former Chelsea goalkeeper Ricardo Prasel of Brazil taking on UFC veteran Daniel Omielanczuk. In the co-feature, more heavyweights square off as Marek Samociuk takes on Izuagbe Ugonoh, as well as a bout between female strawweights Anita Bekus and Roberta Zocco. It's a stacked card from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Jermain Taylor vs. Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-0, 17 KOs) making the 5th defense of his WBC and WBO Middleweight Titles, this time against upstart Kelly 'The Ghost' Pavlik (31-0, 28 KOs) on September 29, 2007 at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jonathon Banks vs. Seth Mitchell
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a heavyweight battle that ends in a curious decision between Jonathon Banks and Seth Mitchell , as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Travis Walker vs. Chris Arreola
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle among heavyweights as Travis Walker faces the then-undefeated Chris Arreola, who was ranked in the top 10 by four of the boxing organizations. While the fight seems to go to one side after the opening bell, the momentum quickly shifts.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 4 of 5

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 75
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po pick delicious green beans. The Noo-­‐noo puts the beans into the Tubby Custard Machine and out comes tasty, green Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 14
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'Ant' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of ants, a black one, another with two feelers and a teeny-weeny tiny ant!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Mae-Mae finds a very precious pearl on the beach. But when the pearl is taken, the friends must go on a submarine adventure to get it back.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Messy is thirsty for an adventure, so he goes to OKIDO to help his friends solve the mystery of the dried-up oasis.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 75
programme.desc: Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when Bluey and Bingo take over a stump as a nail salon, Dad finds he's got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Andy heads to the Galapagos Islands to see how sea lions deal with annoying flies.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about beavers.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 7
programme.desc: Captain Captain discovers that Sandy and Seaweed don't know any of the correct names for the parts of the ship, so she decides to teach them through a song!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 52
programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sonny returns to Sodor to try to be a really useful engine again but some of the other trains aren't willing to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Duck has some competition for Sarah's attention when a brand new toy arrives.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Scarf Lady introduces Sarah and Duck to a new game involving knitted sporting equipment.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Nelly and Nora gather rainwater so they can make their own raindrop music.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Dog wants some high adventure and so he and Pug visit several different stories. Each time they arrive in their new story, they find that they are being chased by various characters.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 74
programme.desc: Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 42
programme.desc: It's snowing outside, but JoJo and Gran Gran are cosy in the kitchen making gingerbread biscuits. JoJo knows exactly what shape to make. There's plenty of help from Ned, Monty and Jared too.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 38
programme.desc: When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 50
programme.desc: Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. It's a key.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 49

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 4

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou - EP 1

programme.title: First Blood (S1) - EP 8

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 3

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: As he starts the final part of his journey deep into Iraq, Michael finds a local school in Baghdad and as he did in North Korea talks to the children about life in Iraq and what they hope to do in the future, and how they see the rest of the world. Michael then visits the ancient site of Babylon, a place he used to read about when he was studying the bible at school. He also gets access to enter the massive palace built by Saddam Hussein that overlooks the historic site.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 1
programme.desc: Maya Rudolph and Andy Samberg get to know the home baker teams; the bakers make small treats to reflect their traditions and then bake a cake with an outside representing one partner and the inside representing the other.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 2
programme.desc: Maya Rudolph and Amy Poehler host and executive produce "Baking It," the award-winning cooking competition series that challenges talented home bakers to create the tastiest treats for the chance to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 3
programme.desc: Maya and Andy divide up the bakers into two groups, one being Naughty and the other being Nice, for their first team challenge; everyone gets to play Secret Santa as they make treats for their fellow bakers.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 4
programme.desc: The bakers roll up their sleeves to build the gingerbread house of their dreams; Andy and Maya get into the spirit of gift-giving with mixed results.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 5
programme.desc: In the "Short & Sweet" challenge, Maya and Andy play White Elephant with the bakers using store-bought ingredients; in the "Pie in the Sky" challenge, bakers create stunning and delicious pies.

programme.title: Baking It - EP 6
programme.desc: The bakers must make edible holiday ornaments, a savory brunch item and a sweet dessert bake -- all to determine who will be crowned the "Best in Dough."

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.desc: PBSI Sirkuit Nasional is one of the national scale badminton events held in Indonesia. Every year, this event is always held in several series, in several places in Indonesia. Sirkuit Nasional is used as a benchmark for developing national badminton achievements.

programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Our landscape has changed dramatically over the last 50 years.Wild plants, bushes and trees have disappeared, and strange new plants have become familiar.With big, bold experiments and innovative approaches this series offers a colourful and engaging window onto our natural environment and reveals what the future may hold for biodiversity everywhere.

programme.title: Dingo Untamed
programme.desc: Dingo is an award winning Discovery Channel and YouTube Wildlife conservationist and adventurer whose various social media platform reach in excess of 200 million viewers every year. Through these videos, Dingo actively strives to create a lasting connection between people and animals in the hope that this connection can in turn help to save them.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: My Gardening (R)
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Go Focus
programme.desc: An up-to-date information on the recent matches of the Go competitions along with easy to understand explanation on the various moves and techniques.

programme.title: NHK ACADEMIA
programme.desc: This is a lecture program in which top runners in various fields as lecturers speak professionally and uniquely on themes that "must be shared now more than ever". What is the "unshakable intellect" that they have arrived at by overcoming the anxieties and setbacks of their youth? Every month, we invite participants to join us for live online lectures.

programme.title: News & Weather (R)
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World (R)
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: Saturday Drama "30 million" Eps. 6 (R)
programme.desc: Sasaki Yuko (Adachi Yumi) works as a temporary employee at a call center, struggling with her mortgage and child-rearing. Despite her overbearing boss and uncertain future, she tries to make ends meet. Her husband Yoshimitsu (Aoki Munetaka) is optimistic but doesn’t earn much, which frustrates Yuko and her only joy is her son. One day, a misfortune strikes the Sasaki family, and a momentary lapse in judgment drastically changes their lives.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Tournament Kyushu Basho Highlights
Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 47
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Deepest Japan Research (R)
programme.desc: Not only food, anime and traditional arts, now that all fronts of Japan have attracted foreign researchers’ attention! This program covered astonishing researches, which results in getting to know Japanese specificity that they didn’t even realize themselves.

programme.title: Local Exquisite Omusubi
programme.desc: Introducing a variety of Omusubi (rice balls) that can be found in different parts of Japan, with introduction of their origins and ideas of how to eat them.

programme.title: Fun with Okinawa Dialects (R)
programme.desc: Get familiar with Okinawa dialects by listening to folk tales and children's songs.

programme.desc: Fresh news and information to start off the morning. Specialized reporters and anchors will wake up the viewers with this live news program.

programme.title: Historical Drama "Dear Radiance" Eps. 43 (R)
programme.desc: Michinaga insists that the repeated fires in the imperial palace are caused by a deity’s anger towards Sanjo’s politics, and proposes Emperor Sanjo to abdicate the throne. However, Sanjo firmly refuses this, which deepens the conflict between the two. After that, Michinaga feels something unusual in Sanjo. Meanwhile, Mahiro, who keeps writing "The Tale of Genji" while working for Akiko, is reunited with her father Tametoki, who has returned from Echigo.

programme.title: The Soul of Minyo "Tokoname City, Aichi Prefecture"
programme.desc: Enjoy the live stage of Japanese traditional folk songs.

programme.title: PROJECT ALIENS PA008
programme.desc: How can people understand others with different values or thinking? This is an experimental documentary program in which four young people in alien avatars interact in a VR space, not knowing each other’s appearance or attributes. In their quest to travel to the moon together, they learn who they are and what difference they have with each other.

programme.title: Natsui Itsuki's Haiku Trip! "Akita Prefecture" Part 1
programme.desc: Haiku poet Natsui Itsuki sets "Haiku Post" across Japan, and receives "your piece of Haiku"! She selects unique works from among them, and invites the authors of those haiku to share their intentions, memories, and life stories. ROLAND, the King of the Hosts, accompanies her as a partner on the trip.

programme.desc: Chiyonofuji is a legendary Yokozuna, who bolstered the popularity of Sumo in Showa and Heisei Era. Behind the scenes of his glorious life in the ring, he suffered repeated crises; dislocated shoulder and death of beloved daughter... However, people were moved by the sight of Yokozuna gritting his teeth to overcome these crises. In this program, popular professional storyteller Kanda Aguri goes up on the stage, reads out his biographic notes with precious footages projected on a huge wall.

programme.title: The Visualization Entertainment: Go! Kaneo-kun
programme.desc: The show is MC-ed by comedian Ariyoshi Hiroiki, who hosts an NHK program on a regular basis for the first time. The mascot character "Kaneo-kun" (voice of Nobu, of comedy duo Chidori), who loves money, visits various places, including popular visiting locations, and looks into different phenomena to learn how money plays a role. The undertaking help unravel unexpected trends in society. The program, which can be enjoyed by every member of the family, offers much food for thought.

programme.title: A Great Way To Care - EP 10
programme.desc: Dr. Ko Lap-yan heads a team of senior psychiatrists and residents at the Yan Wo Hospital in Hong Kong. With a specialty at diagnosing criminals, Ko also has close ties with the Serious Crime Unit of the Hong Kong Police Force, a unit headed by Senior Inspector Chung Kwon-ban.

programme.title: No Return - EP 20

programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1625
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 10
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 15
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 89
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 8
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 9
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1625
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 10
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 15
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 89
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 8
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 65
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 8
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 3
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 4
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 11
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 12
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers.
