programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 14
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Aces Go Places III
programme.desc: On his holiday in Paris, King Kong is enlisted by the Queen and a secret British agent "Mr. Bond" to recover stolen jewels from the Hong Kong police. Back in Hong Kong, King Kong uncovers their real identities as criminals who are part of a crime syndicate, so he teams up with Baldy to stop the faux Mr. Bond from stealing the priceless jewels.

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Joe loves motorbike racing but is upset with his father as he deters him from the racing competition. In a race with David, Joe is seriously injured and traumatized. His close friend challenges David on his behalf but ends up in an accident and died. Can Joe finally conquer his fear and rebuild the relationship with his father?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Pauline's father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: La Brassiere
programme.desc: Samantha, the president of a renowned brassiere company, breaks the tradition and hires two guys, Johnny and Wayne, as brassiere designers, and requires them to submit a design for the "Ultimate Bra" in three months. The time is almost up, can those two guys really work out the "Ultimate Bra"?

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Lost In Time
programme.desc: Siu Wai lost her fiance Wen in a car accident. To raise his son with his ex-wife, she decides to follow Wen's footstep and become a mini-bus driver. While Siu Wai faces many challenges at work, she is able to overcome them with the help of another mini-bus driver Dai Fai, who gradually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: Peacock King
programme.desc: Ashura, daughter of the King of Hell, is awakened by evil spirit Raga who brings her to modern day Tokyo to wreak havoc. With the key to Hell's Gate, Ashura can set her father free from imprisonment. Two young men, Peacock and Fruit, meet in Tokyo with the same mission to stop Ashura. They team up after knowing each other and becoming friends.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: Tiger on Beat
programme.desc: Lazy police veteran Francis, teams up with police rookie Michael to investigate the murder of a heroin trafficker. They track down a bar girl Donna and learn that she is the sister of the dead trafficker who is killed by the drug boss. Donna decides to work with the police and the duo set up traps to arrest the drug boss based on her information.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Twinkle, Twinkle Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Jackie Chan rejoins the finale of this comedy trilogy for another action packed adventure. Five Lucky Stars on holiday in Thailand are told to contact an informant there, but he gets killed. They must return to Hong Kong to protect the informant's daughter who holds the evidence. Assisted by two super cops, they team up to hunt down the killers.

programme.title: Saga Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: In this sequel, the powerful Ashura wants to quit the evil world and asks Master Chi for help. He grants her seven days on earth, after which she must leave to live inside a statue. As demons keep harassing Ashura, she teams up with Peacock and Fruit on the seventh day to destroy them. This touches the gods, allowing her to transform into a human.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing's wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu's beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue...

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Ying's father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt "Shaolin Hand Lock" from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Ling's house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang's father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yang's escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master's daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: TVBS News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 9

programme.title: Mr Player 15 - EP 16
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: We Are Big Eaters 6 - EP 13
programme.desc: A new chapter of Taiwanese food show! Discover temptations in the form of great food in "We Are Big Eaters 6".

programme.title: Time Concert 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Time Concert 2 continues to return to the rustic natural environment with the concept of back to basics and pure beauty, vividly interpreting the warm power of music art and natural life to enlighten and mingle with each other.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 16
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 2
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: A man is hired to look after a spoiled rich girl, but is then pulled into a scheme meant to re-evaluate her life.

programme.title: Hello, Saturday - EP 24
programme.desc: Helmed by the ever-popular veteran show host He Jiong, this all-new variety show features celebrity artistes from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan participating in song and dance performances, games and more.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 4 - EP 3
programme.desc: In this season, the show takes a fresh twist by inviting 34 diverse guests, who are divided into the Older Brothers and Younger Brothers teams. Get ready for intense music battles, vibrant stage acts, and a blend of camaraderie and competition among the brothers, all shining brightly!

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 6
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

The rookie detective learns techniques used by Kazama while they work on the murder case.

programme.title: Fields & Feasts - EP 4
programme.desc: Brimming with nostalgia, flavours and stories from the countryside, "Fields and Feasts" depicts the tales of digging up, inheriting, and re-creating these delicacies by hidden countryside creators through the lens of the camera, serving up an array of nostalgic and flavourful memories.

programme.desc: The show is set to carry on the 'authentic live vocal artistry' legacy of Singer 2024, featuring 24 talented newcomers vying for the spotlight. After three stages of captivating performances, the winning singer will clinch their chance to shine in Singer 2025.

programme.title: Mighty Baby
programme.desc: Lena, Johnny, and Wayne are assigned to develop a new infant product line, "Mighty Baby." With Wayne's fear of babies, child behavior expert Boey is brought in to help. Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?

programme.title: Side Story Of Fox Volant - EP 26
programme.desc: Hu Fei steps up to avenge his father's death, transforming from a brave, reckless teen into a hero among his generation, caring about the common people and serving communities all across the country. However, things get complicated when he falls for that same warlord's daughter, the stunning Yuan Zi Yi.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 1
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.
